name: getShorthandPropValue
description:
Given a theme object, a string of space delimited prop values,
and a propName prefix, combines each prop value with the
propName prefix and replaces it with a corresponding value
from the theme object.

params.name: componentName
params.description: - the name of the component (for error messages)

params.name: componentTheme
params.description: - a theme object of keys and values

params.name: propValue
params.description: - a space delimited string of values

params.name: propName
params.description: - a prefix to combine with each propValue

returns.description: a string with each value replaced with a value from the theme object

title: getShorthandPropValue
